title: kindred passive
body: I was wondering whether kindred passive should be given to warwick as it would give him some well needed love and seems to fit

replies.body:
Warwick has a decent jungle passive, decently shit. Just that passive in the jungle alone needs a buff, using it against an enemy, pointless.

If Rito changed WW passive, they need to give him some form of lifesteal passive back in his kit, possibly reduce his Q or change that also.

While we are at it, since WW is quite old, how about just rework him to make him viable again? He is after all a part of the first set of champs to be released, simply buffing and nerfing him over the journey has not helped him with how the game is now.
